languages.text: "Я так хочу снова увидеть настоящее солнце! Эти отвратительные, болезненные светила над головой мутят мне разум..."
"I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."
languages.original_text: "Я так хочу снова увидеть настоящее солнце! Эти отвратительные, болезненные светила над головой мутят мне разум..."

traits.locale_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我渴望再次看到真正的恒星！我们头顶的光芒让我感到恶心，它在扰乱我的思想……”
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: “我渴望再次看到真正的恒星！我们头顶的光芒让我感到恶心，它在扰乱我的思想……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Comme le soleil me manque ! Ces lumières répugnantes au-dessus de nos têtes m'embrouillent l'esprit... »
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: « Comme le soleil me manque ! Ces lumières répugnantes au-dessus de nos têtes m'embrouillent l'esprit... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Quiero volver a ver un sol de verdad! Estas luces repugnantes y enfermizas están afectando a mi mente...».
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Quiero volver a ver un sol de verdad! Estas luces repugnantes y enfermizas están afectando a mi mente...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「本物の太陽をまた見たくてたまりません！降り注ぐこの光はひどく不快で、私の心をかき乱します…」
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: 「本物の太陽をまた見たくてたまりません！降り注ぐこの光はひどく不快で、私の心をかき乱します…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehne mich danach, wieder eine echte Sonne zu sehen! Diese widerwärtigen, abstoßenden Lichter über uns rauben mir den Verstand ..."
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehne mich danach, wieder eine echte Sonne zu sehen! Diese widerwärtigen, abstoßenden Lichter über uns rauben mir den Verstand ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

languages.text: "Gerçek güneşi yeniden görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum! Üzerimizdeki bu itici, mide bulandırıcı ışıklar zihnimi bulandırıyor..."
languages.original_text: "I yearn to see a real sun again! These repulsive, sickening lights above us are playing havoc with my mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek güneşi yeniden görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum! Üzerimizdeki bu itici, mide bulandırıcı ışıklar zihnimi bulandırıyor..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
